advancement.horseman.summon_horse.descri: Summon a horse with Sending Horn
advancement.horseman.summon_horse.title: Honk If You Like Horses
gui.horseman.summoning.cannot_bind.alrea: §cThis animal is already bound to you
gui.horseman.summoning.cannot_summon.dea: §cNo response... Maybe something has happened to the animal?
gui.horseman.summoning.cannot_summon.in_: §cThe animal cannot hear the Horn from this dimension
gui.horseman.summoning.cannot_summon.no_: §cNo animal is bound to this instrument
gui.horseman.summoning.cannot_summon.too: §cThe animal is too far away to hear the Horn
horseman.jei.info.copper_horn1: Can be used to summon the horse to you.
horseman.jei.info.copper_horn2: Bind the horse to the instrument with [Sneak+Use] then [Use] to summon it.
horseman.jei.info.copper_horn3: Horse can respond to several instruments.
item.horseman.copper_horn.tooltip.bind: §8[§7Sneak+Use§8] on a horse to bind it to the instrument.
